thread.section_title: Holiday Inn NYC - Lower East Side - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Staff culture of friendly hospitality
thread.title_full: Staff culture of friendly hospitality - Review of Holiday Inn NYC - Lower East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ReadTheTruth
title: Staff culture of friendly hospitality
text:
It's obvious this hotel hires and trains staff carefully. To me that's everything. Every employee we encountered was friendly, helpful, engaging, and courteous.
Property is well-located for points throughout Lower Manhattan and especially of course the ever interesting and ever improving Lower East Side. It also has very convenient access to Brooklyn and NJ. The nearby subway is your gateway to all boroughs.
Property is well-maintained. It's not pretentious, its purposeful. Things work in room, in fitness center, on lobby computers. Things are stocked. You can tell.
Housekeeper showed real interest in helping us. Restaurant server engaged us. Maintenance people were cheerful. Front desk people always inquired of us when they were available as we passed. Happened to meet the GM. He sets the tone.
Note: separate independent secure reasonable parking lot across the street is a huge benefit for travelers arriving by car. In years to come, check in advance as to the availability of that service.
